      • getBestHands

        private java.util.ArrayList<HandPoker> getBestHands​(Player player,
                                                    boolean bMadeHand)
                                             throws HandException
        getBestHands - will pass back an array list of the best hands. If bMadeHand is true, it's looking for a hand that doesn't have jokers... which means the hand is an actual hand
        Parameters:
        player - - given player
        bMadeHand - - if true, ensure the found hand has no jokers.

        Throws:
        HandException
